name: Hot
overview:
Hot is a last minute Hotel Booking app that offers deep discounts on same day hotel rooms.

Hot began as a disruptive innovation project in December 2011, with the intention of solving two problems in the same market …

Where can you find and book last minute hotel rooms at competitive prices, without having to search on a tiny mobile phone screen only to find websites, search engines or sponsored links that show false promotions?

Where can Hotels dispose of their unsold rooms?

Hot offers a last minute, same day discount, hotel booking solution in 18 countries and 101 cities. Currently Available as Apple, Androidsand Blackberry Apps.

Consumers are offered deeply discounted, last minute bargain hotels each day, in 18 countries and 101 cities throughout Europe

For hotels Hot is the channel to sell their un-sold rooms that otherwise would be empty.
